title.rendered: Level Up Your Summer Internship with Lauren

content.rendered:
Preparing for your summer internship? Lauren Reinfeld, Campus Recruiting & Program Manager, offers tips on how to excel in your next internship role.

  1. Network well beyond your team.
  2. Set goals and ask for feedback.
  3. Attend all firm events.
  4. Keep a log of what you learn.

excerpt.rendered: Preparing for your summer internship? Lauren Reinfeld, Campus Recruiting & Program Manager, offers tips on how to excel in your next internship role.
